Shipping Information

Fast, reliable shipping options to meet your needs

Shipping Options

Choose the shipping method that works best for you

Standard Shipping

Economical shipping option for non-urgent orders

5-7 business days

Express Shipping

Fast delivery for urgent orders

2-3 business days

International Shipping

Worldwide shipping to over 50 countries

7-14 business days

Same-Day Delivery

Available in select metropolitan areas

Same day

Important Shipping Information

Order Processing

Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. You'll receive an email confirmation with tracking information once your order ships.

Delivery Areas

We ship to all major cities in India and internationally to over 50 countries. International shipping times vary by destination.

Tracking

All orders include tracking information. You'll receive updates via email and can track your shipment in real-time on our website.

Customs & Duties

International orders may be subject to customs fees and import duties, which are the responsibility of the customer.

Estimated Delivery Times

Delivery times are estimates and may vary based on location, weather, and carrier delays

Metro Cities (Delhi, Mumbai, Bangalore, etc.)2-3 business days
Tier 2 Cities3-5 business days
Tier 3 Cities & Rural Areas5-7 business days
International (Asia Pacific)7-10 business days
International (Europe, Americas)10-14 business days

Questions About Shipping?

Contact our customer service team for shipping inquiries
